LanguageData.EggChaoUnfertilized.label: Chao egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggChaoUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized Chao egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggChaoFertilized.label: Chao egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggChaoFertilized.description: Fertilized Chao egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Chao. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
